channel.title: NpcDrops
channel.description:
I have tried asking before, but never really got any answers. I know a lot of other people are wondering about this too. Does anyone know how to switch the npcdrop files from item2.java to npcdrops.cfg? The only server I have seen that actually uses npcdrops.cfg is Devolution v7, and that is what I have grown acustommed to.
I'd love for some help =) Thanks
